website_summaries.verdict: The re-issue of 1991's iconic EQT ADV silhouette called the Adidas EQT Support ADV highlights modern elements fitting for the contemporary needs. This Adidas model delivers comfort that suits all-day use without sacrificing style.Also, many reviewers applaud its lightness and its premium craftsmanship that seamlessly blend high-performance and style in a single iteration. In addition, the durability of this pair is highly praised which made this kick a strongly recommended model by several respondents.
pros: The majority of the reviewers have shared that the Adidas EQT Support ADV on feet delivers all-day comfort
Many buyers applaud its modern and stylish appeal
Buyers can purchase this pair at an affordable price
Some purchasers note that this model has enhanced comfort brought by the Ortholite sockliner
Purchasers can choose from a wide range of colorways offered in the market
The high-quality materials used in the Adidas Originals EQT Support ADV are praised by several buyers
Most users commend the lightness of the EQT Support ADV by Adidas
Many buyers applaud the durability of this pair even when worn as everyday footwear
Most of the wearers share that they will recommend this pair to their friends
cons: Some online buyers complain about the narrow width of the women’s and men’s Adidas EQT Support ADV casual shoes
One reviewer says that the sole of Adidas EQT Support ADV creases easily after using only for a few hours
A critic shares that he does not like the irremovable insole

customer_reviews.title: One of the comfiest shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have honestly got to be the comfiest shoes I've ever worn. They're made out of a tough strong material yet still look very fashionable. They fit as expected and have a comfy sole. They arrived within a couple of days which I was very happy with and I highly recommend buying these shoes. The one down side is, is that you can't tie them up very tight but it doesn't seem to affect the secureness of them
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and great looking trainers
customer_reviews.text: Wearing this every other day for gym, casual wear and driving, its comfortable for every situation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby was very happy with these, but tightro get on so had to buy a shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: karen mannering

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived next day which was a week earlier than expected. The shoe is really comfy just a struggle to keep them in a pristine white condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trainers. Husband was really pleased with them. Fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Martine Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: EQT
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers my 3rd pair go a half size up ad they are small fit. Promt service from seller too good experience.
customer_reviews.author: John freeman

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish fit
customer_reviews.text: That I have been a size 10 for 15 years and now I’m seemingly a 10.5 not happy
customer_reviews.author: Douglasure

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit so well and give plenty of support while in the gym. So impressed, I have two pairs 👍
customer_reviews.author: G. Fox

customer_reviews.title: No lace up
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed an very comfortable u feel like ur walking on air
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: terrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: Whilst they look nice and they are probably good trainers, the fabric they use makes it incredibly difficult to get your foot in even if you have the right size. i have size 9 and lots of other adidas trainers and yeezys in 9 and they fit fine. I cant even get these on my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jay PURCELL

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: They were bought as a present for my son's 17th birthday and he was absolutely delighted with them! They are, apparently, very comfortable and they look great on. Very pleased with this purchase and bought at a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Louisa Morgan

product_meta.title: adidas Men’s Eqt Support Adv Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Adidas - Sneakers - Eqt Support Adv - Men
feature_bullets: Breathable knit upper with premium synthetic nubuck overlays; Snakeskin-look synthetic leather quarter panels
Soft molded TPU support piece wraps heel
Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite� sockliner
Compression molded EVA midsole with integrated 3-Stripes; Sock-like construction
